page.topic: How to Install or Update to a Specific Version of Alpha Anywhere
page.description: The Universal Installer can be used to install or update an install to a specific version of Alpha Anywhere.

discussion.p: Products installed from the *[ui:Available]* tab include options for selecting the target build type and version. You can also choose a different installation location. If you want to update installed Alpha Anywhere products that do not appear on the *[ui:Installed]* tab, or wish to install another version of Alpha Anywhere along side existing installations, follow the steps below.
These instructions apply to the Development Edition, Application Server for IIS, Application Server, and Runtime products.

note.p: If you have already downloaded the Universal Installer, you do not need to download it again.

description.p: On the *[ui:Available]* tab, locate the product you want to install or update.
Select the installation location. Click the *[ui:...]* button next to the *[ui:Location]* text box.

figure.title: Use the *[ui:...]* button to select a different installation location

description.p: Navigate to the directory where you want to install the product. This can be an existing or new directory.
Check *[ui:Include Oracle Instant Client]* if you plan to build apps that connect to an Oracle database.
Select the desired build type from the *[ui:Type of build to install]* dropdown. The following build types are available:

item.name: *[Preview build]* - Release candidates to become stable builds. Use caution with preview builds in a production environment.
*[Nightly build]* - latest build of the product as it is updated by the Alpha Software team. Nightly builds are not intended for use in a production environment.

figure.title: You can choose your build type. The *[ui:?]* icon includes an explanation for the selected type.

description.p: Select the version to install from the *[ui:Version to install]* dropdown. The available versions for the selected build type are listed in chronological order with the newest build at the top of the list. The newest release for the build type is selected by default.

figure.title: Available versions are listed in chronological order with the newest at the top.

description.p: Click *[ui:OK]* to save the installation options.
Click the *[ui:Install]* button to install the product.
If you are installing to an existing location, you may be prompted to confirm overwriting the directory. Click *[ui:Overwrite]* to continue the installation.

If prompted to reboot, reboot your computer and rerun the installer. You may see this prompt if you have pending Windows Updates or have installed another product that requires a reboot. A pending reboot may prevent the Alpha Anywhere installation from completing.
You can optionally click *[ui:Continue]*, however it is strongly recommended that you reboot your system before continuing with the installation.
If you reboot, you may need to reconfigure your Installation Options as described above.
After the installation completes, your installed or updated product will be available on the *[ui:Installed]* tab.

After the product is installed, you can manage upgrading to future versions on the Installed tab. Multiple installed versions of the same product will have separate entries if they have been installed using the Universal Installer.
